_sText:
This card has a secret room for a VIP player, he automatically gets in the early rounds.

This monitor is equipped with a special room with three camera positions, as well as a door that opens after 2 minutes into the round.

Vip has to pass through the door and get to the point of salvation, for it will fly a helicopter.

Teramo is only one thing to kill or AIAI room (door sweep), or when he would run away to the helicopter.

Vip player may leave the room, as well as panthers can get to it by vintilyatsii.

Ventilated room is over the secret room.

The map has a few changes, but in general, the whole atmosphere is maintained.
